intro: Hicorius myristica, commonly known as the nutmeg tree, is a tropical evergreen shrub native to the Banda Islands in Indonesia. It belongs to the Myristicaceae family and is closely related to the cinnamon and mace plants. The tree produces a fruit that contains the aromatic seeds used as spices, with the outer covering known as mace.
